Class JsonFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.tu_varna.sit.a4.fn22621660.json.JsonFormat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrintCommand, SaveAsCommand, SaveCommand

    public class JsonFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    The JsonFormat class provides methods to format JSON strings with indentation.

      • formatJson

        public java.lang.String formatJson(java.lang.String jsonString,
                                   int indentWidth)
        Formats the given JSON string with the specified indent width.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - the JSON string to format.
        indentWidth - the width of each indentation level.
        Returns:
        the formatted JSON string with proper indentation.

      • createIndent

        public java.lang.String createIndent(int width)
        Creates an indentation string of the specified width.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the indentation.
        Returns:
        a string consisting of spaces with the specified width.
